en.subject: Notice: Removal From Previously Assigned Accommodations In %REGION%
en.body:
Dear %TO_FIRSTNAME% %TO_LASTNAME%,
This is a notice to inform you that %FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% has removed you from the following accommodation during your rotation in %REGION%. You have now been removed from:
%APARTMENT_ADDRESS%
You are no longer scheduled to reside in this apartment from %INHABITING_START% until %INHABITING_FINISH%.
Should you have any questions or concerns please contact %FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% in the %DEPARTMENT_TITLE% office for further information.
Sincerely,
%DEPARTMENT_TITLE% Office
